comment_body:
/u/shortstory1, I have found an error in your post:

 > “~~Their were~~ [**was**] a few youngsters”

I declare this post of shortstory1 incorrect; it should be “~~Their were~~ [**was**] a few youngsters” instead. ‘Their’ is possessive; ‘there’ is a pronoun or an adverb.

 ^(This is an automated bot. I do not intend to shame your mistakes. If you think the errors which I found are incorrect, please contact me through DMs or contact my owner EliteDaMyth!)
